name: Indoor Sports World
description:
All of your favourite Indoor Sports Games in one Place:
Air Hockey – Darts - Pool - Snooker

Pick-up and play the ultimate indoor games collection!

• 11 game types with 4 game modes set over 8 beautiful 3D match venues and dozens of customization options
• Unique Sharing of game progress & trophy awards, via Twitter & Facebook
• Multiplayer fun - play against friends and family
• 12 exciting PSN trophies to earn
• Intuitive and responsive touch controls

1-2 player(s)
Network Features
1000KB Minimum
Touchscreen
Dual Analog Sticks
Front Camera

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation®Vita systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account.
